verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] promising " quite a scene " when three Korean - Americans who were detained in North Korea return to the mainland U.S. after more than a year in prison .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: promising] [ARG2: " quite a scene " when three Korean - Americans who were detained in North Korea return to the mainland U.S. after more than a year in prison] .
President Donald Trump is promising " quite a scene " when three Korean - Americans who [V: were] detained in North Korea return to the mainland U.S. after more than a year in prison .

President Donald Trump is promising " quite a scene " when [ARG1: three Korean - Americans] [R-ARG1: who] were [V: detained] [ARGM-LOC: in North Korea] return to the mainland U.S. after more than a year in prison .
